TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A helper class that creates instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Once created, the DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator creates new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> instances, sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.InstanceId%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.SequenceId%2A> and increments the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.MessageNumber%2A> for each successive <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> instance created.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int64 instanceId, class System.Uri sequenceId) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified instance ID and sequence ID.
